title: Facebook bows out of Apple and Spotify’s podcast market after one year
content:
A year after announcing podcasts and other audio initiatives literally everywhere on its platform, Facebook is now backing out of the business, according to a report by Bloomberg. Starting June 3, podcasts won’t be available on Zuckerberg’s social media anymore.

more…

The post Facebook bows out of Apple and Spotify’s podcast market after one year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A year after announcing podcasts and other audio initiatives everywhere on its platform, Facebook is now backing out of this business.
